sentence.Network_en: Any word that's not legible will be counted as wrong.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何无法辨认的词都将视为错字。

sentence.Network_en: The price must be legible to a purchaser.
sentence.Network_cn: 价格要写得清楚些,让买家一眼能辨认出.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin legibilis, from legere 'to read'

entry.tran: （字迹）清晰可辨的，清楚易读的
entry.def: Legible writing is clear enough to read.

means.word_mean: 1. (of handwriting, print, etc.) able to be read;

auth_sentence.content: I doubt I could write a legible line today.
auth_sentence.res_content: I doubt I could write a legible line today.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I doubt I could write a legible line today.

auth_sentence.content: Legible cities Inside, it was an even bigger task.
auth_sentence.res_content: Legible cities Inside, it was an even bigger task.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Legible cities Inside, it was an even bigger task.

auth_sentence.content: The squadron insignia were still legible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The squadron insignia were still legible.

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不+legitimate合法的→adj.不合法的,私生的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+al……的→adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法的, 合理的, 正统的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+itm+ate表形容词→adj.合法的, 合理的, 正统的
il不+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
legend[n.传说,传奇;图例]+ary……的→adj.传说的,传奇的
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑
stems_affixes.word_buile: illegitimate[adj.不合法的,私生的]+cy表名词→n.不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法,墨守陈规,法律上的义务
stems_affixes.word_buile: legal[adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的]+ity表名词→n.合法,墨守陈规,法律上的义务

stems_affixes.value_cn: 学院,高等专科学校,大学
stems_affixes.word_buile: col共同+leg讲,读,说+e→共同说,共同读的地方→大学
leg讲,读,说+end→讲出的东西→传奇的故事;引申为地图的图例

stems_affixes.value_cn: 功课,课;一堂课,一节课;[常复]课程;教训
stems_affixes.word_buile: less=leg讲,读,说+on表名词→讲话,教训→课
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表
re反+leg法律+ate表动词→反法律的人被放逐

means.word_mean: 易读的,清晰可读的,清楚的
